about_the_game:
On the weekend your neighbor's step sister invited friends over to his step mom's house so they can all meet up. When they played music, you and the other neighbors didn't like the music and decided to come over and complain. As soon as you got over there with your girlfriend, you saw your neighbor talking to other neighbors at his home. Once you made close contact with them you all shrunk to the size of bugs. It turned out that the step mom was a scientist who shrunk them with a shrink ray by mistake. You and the neighborhood now have to get a giantess girl's attention.

Features

  • Interactions
  • Story driven
  • Free roam with an ant and fly
  • Climbing mechanics
  • Many death scenes that show what happens to the player

content_descriptors.notes: Contains bad language, sexual content and violence.

detailed_description:
On the weekend your neighbor's step sister invited friends over to his step mom's house so they can all meet up. When they played music, you and the other neighbors didn't like the music and decided to come over and complain. As soon as you got over there with your girlfriend, you saw your neighbor talking to other neighbors at his home. Once you made close contact with them you all shrunk to the size of bugs. It turned out that the step mom was a scientist who shrunk them with a shrink ray by mistake. You and the neighborhood now have to get a giantess girl's attention.

Features

  • Interactions
  • Story driven
  • Free roam with an ant and fly
  • Climbing mechanics
  • Many death scenes that show what happens to the player

movies.name: Girl Who Shrunk the Neighbors Sneak Peek

name: Girl Who Shrunk the Neighbors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7-10700 or Ryzen 5 6600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7-10700K or Ryzen 5 7600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

short_description: On the weekend your neighbor's step sister invited friends over to his step mom's house so they can all meet up. When they played music, you and the other neighbors didn't like it and complained. At your neighbor's home with your girlfriend, all of you then suddenly get shrunk to the size of bugs.
